timeline.bodyText:
This rule is recommended, but conflicts with oEQ's pattern of using __mock__ for both mock implementation and mock data.
https://github.com/jest-community/eslint-plugin-jest/blob/master/docs/rules/no-mocks-import.md
Setting this to warn is a middle ground, we may want to either disable it entirely or find a new location for mock data.
